CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS offer ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, trader_id INTEGER NOT NULL, labor_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, -- wage of the trader (without expenses) description TEXT NULL, total_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, -- total price of the offer (including expenses) created_on TIMESTAMP(3) WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, updated_on TIMESTAMP(3) WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL );
ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS offer ADD CONSTRAINT fk_offer_trader_details_id FOREIGN KEY (trader_id) REFERENCES trader_details(id) ON DELETE CASCADE;
